tags: im not sure does she still have cosmic awareness in both
this is what we see explicitly in recent comics and the movie anyway
summary: Not to be dumb, but what are capt marvels powers?
question: Not to be dumb, but what are capt marvels powers?
answer:
You’re not dumb at all honey bee! The full extent of her powers is never really explored, but here’s what we know so far:

In the film it’s definitely energy blasts, flight, super strength, durability, speed and a binary level extension of all of that. (Binary is the name for the super powerful and glowy state she enters).

In the comics she also has energy absorption but I don’t know is this also in MCU carols extensive list (I could speculate but that would be a spoiler)

She also is able to breath in space and is evidently unaffected by the vacuum of space. She doesn’t freeze and go pop. In addition to this she also has extensive combat training.

blog.name: lotsoffandomimagines
blog.title: ✎ Just Imagine It ✎
blog.description:
☆ masterlist → rules → fandom list → about → fav imagines ☆
Hi! The name’s Ace. My blog runs on requests so send them in, but read my rules and fandom list before doing so! Gifs aren't mine. OC information is in my “about” link. Last but not least, this is a safe space for everyone! Be nice to each other and let your imagination soar.

summary:
Requested by anonymous 
Ever since you first encountered Carol she’s been like a mother figure to you. Not only has she...
body:
Requested by anonymous

Ever since you first encountered Carol she’s been like a mother figure to you. Not only has she protected you, taught you how to be better, and encourage you but the two of you were so similar that it was hard to not assume that you were related. Perhaps the similarities between you both was what drawn Carol toward you and motivated her to take you under her wing. Whatever the reason you looked up to her so much that sometimes you would forget certain things…

You and Carol were in the middle of some self defence training and she was showing you how to throw a proper punch. “You have to be grounded, so have your feet placed more like this” Carol instructed before showing you what she meant. You adjusted yourself so you mirrored her position. “There you go, nice job” Carol smiled proudly.

A grin made it’s way across your face in return. “Thanks mom” you blurted out. As soon as the words left your lips you felt your face go hot. Did you really just slip up like that? How embarrassing! Desperate to correct your mistake, you struggled to explain yourself. “A-ah I mean-“. To your surprise before you could finish Carol was laughing and pulling you into a playfully headlock under her arm.

“It’s my pleasure kiddo” the woman assured before ruffling your hair. A sigh of relief left your mouth. Oh thank goodness, you thought you had ruined a good thing there for a second but it appeared as if she was content with it.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN
